contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Court being evenly divided as to whether to render a decision on the merits, the appeal is hereby dismissed.
NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY and ZAPPALA, JJ., would dismiss the appeal as having been improvidently granted.
McDERMOTT, J., files a dissenting opinion.
PAPADAKOS, J., files a dissenting opinion.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
